movie.title: Tenet
movie.actors: John David Washington, Robert Pattinson, Elizabeth Debicki
movie.synopsis: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

movie.title: The Devil All the Time
movie.actors: Donald Ray Pollock, Tom Holland, Robert Pattinson, Jason Clarke
movie.synopsis: Sinister characters converge around a young man devoted to protecting those he loves in a postwar backwoods town teeming with corruption and brutality.

movie.title: Jojo Rabbit
movie.actors: Roman Griffin Davis, Thomasin McKenzie, Scarlett Johansson
movie.synopsis: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

movie.title: Parasite
movie.actors: Song Kang-Ho, Sun-kyun Lee, Yeo-jeong Jo
movie.synopsis: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
